text: a group of three individuals arrived at 430 pm and chose their own seats i was amazed by how busy it was for an early evening the service was excellent i decided to try the shrimp tacos which were delicious the refried beans had a distinct taste of ham bone i will definitely return to this place

ive been to this location a few times and there was this one staff member who displayed extreme rudeness if youre incapable of delivering exceptional customer service being a barista might be your only profession it seems like i wont be revisiting that place again
best bbq ever  go here and thank me later

at soupersalad you can enjoy a hearty meal of soup and salad for nearly 10 along with the choice of including a beverage the quality and selection of food make it a place worth returning to occasionally as its nearby and reasonably priced particularly suitable for kids who prefer water as their drink of choice nevertheless i hold the opinion that making patrons pay separately for a soda is somewhat unjustified
lightening fast arrival even faster lockout service no doubt ill use his service again

are the previous ratings for this restaurant questionable given the consistently slow service despite hoping that the initial two unsatisfactory visits were simply random disappointments the third visit reaffirmed that this is not the case it appears that the restaurants management could benefit from some retraining
i havent had a meal yet and within 15 minutes i am surprised to see my drinks arriving i hope the food compensates for the slow service

its cheap hawaiin food for what it is its pretty good so 3 stars  its simple no frills food and a ton of bang for your buck so if you are looking to unbutton your pants and wreck a toilet on the cheap this is the place for you

since posting this hertz called very quickly and they corrected the errors apologized and fixed the mess to my satisfactionnnthanks to hertz for the quick response and action  nni changed rating to 3 ok beacsue they did fix

the staff members are incredibly warm and hospitable and we eagerly anticipate observing the diverse range of parrots and birds as we explore their shop although it requires a bit of a journey from my southwest area it offers a delightful experience spending an afternoon surrounded by beautiful birds while purchasing plants

i got food poisoning from a chicken burrito from this qdoba two nights ago i have never been so sick or in so much pain in my life only after a trip to urgent care antinausea and pain medicine two bags of iv fluid and nearly 24 hours straight of sleep am i starting to feel better

i was highly anticipating placing my takeout order after hearing such fantastic reviews about this place being a fan of vegetables i decided to go allin with vegetarian options unfortunately it turned out to be just average oh well seems like im still on the hunt for that one outstanding chinese restaurant in the southeastern part of the valley

i received two separate orders but they were identical and i couldnt distinguish between them because they both tasted like sweet and sour sauce which was not what i had ordered and to make matters worse there was no fried rice which is a staple at panda express honestly panda express is superior in comparison and thats saying something

which pho place in the east valley offers amazing deals and has received excellent reviews from me i am particularly fond of their fresh spring rolls my recent order included a seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and a portion of fresh spring rolls all for just 25 it has quickly become one of my top choices
the ultimate brunch experience

prior to a basketball match at uw the location is excellent but it tends to get packed very fast you can find a diverse range of beer options at the pub although the food may not be topnotch and instead falls into the category of typical pub fare

the establishment offers an extensive variety of beers when i visited on a friday afternoon at 4pm it was already bustling with people there is both outdoor seating and plenty of seats indoors it may be challenging to reach the bar during peak hours due to the crowd but they might offer table service later in the evening the prices were fairly reasonable
the location is amazing and the salon has a charming atmosphere ciera did an excellent job cutting and coloring my hair making me feel like a completely different person i will definitely return
the wait staff at this restaurant is pretentious and unfriendly the food is mediocre at best and we have no intention of coming back youd have a better dining experience at joes crab shack

i absolutely adore the place and the salon itself is incredibly adorable cieras haircut and color left me feeling like a brand new woman both in appearance and confidence i am certainly planning to revisit

the atmosphere is lively yet less accommodating to children compared to alternative options in the vicinity the waitstaff possesses an attractive appearance without being excessively friendly it is particularly suitable for indulging in happy hour and experiencing latenight excitement if youre in your twenties while the food is only moderately good

statement 1 the staff is extremely friendly and we are excited to see the various parrots and birds they have in store although its quite a distance from my southwest location it offers a pleasant afternoon of birdwatching while shopping for plants
the location of this place is very convenient just around the corner from my apartment they also have competitive gas prices and an amazing walkin beer freezer
slow service bartender got in an argument  with a guest about warm beer glasses margarita was watery and took forever to come out guacamole tasted like it had mayo in it bring back chinita
how can a bar be both semicrowded and crowded yet unable to afford its bills its something i must solve

we had to wait for 20 minutes until we were able to secure seats in this delightful establishment however the culinary treats surpassed our expectations and the service provided by the staff was exceptionally warm and inviting

for a truly positive dining adventure head over to two for two and indulge in their jackfruit poboy a deliciously satisfying alternative to pulled pork dont miss out on their excellent homemade ginger beer and if youre feeling adventurous request the enticing dark and stormy a hidden gem not stated on the menu

what is there left to say about la banquise its a pretty iconic place in mtl easy argument for the best poutine in the city this is where i had my first poutine and have continued to eat here for many times theyre open late so this is a nice place to go after the bar and fill your belly

im absolutely smitten with the surroundings and the salon exudes a wonderfully chic vibe ciera expertly styled and colored my hair resulting in a complete transformation that left me looking and feeling renewed i am without a doubt going back for more

the setting exudes a fun vibe albeit not as familyfriendly as other places nearby the waitstaff is aesthetically appealing yet not exceedingly sociable it is best suited for enjoying happy hour and engaging in latenight mayhem if youre in your twenties while the food can be described as average
the wait staff comes across as snooty and arrogant the food is nothing special prompting us to decide against returning dining at joes crab shack would be a much preferable choice

russells incredible customer service ensures youll be a repeat customer moving from hawaii to las vegas was made better by the knowledge of having a fantastic korean bbq spot to go to the taste is absolutely amazing and on top of that russell went above and beyond by serving us free drinks and peanuts personally i cant resist ordering their delicious meat jun
definitely get the watermelon margarita

do the slow service and apparent lack of improvement in management positions suggest that previous ratings for this restaurant deserve skepticism after three visits it is disappointing to discover that the first two experiences were not just isolated incidents but rather representative of a pattern is it time for the restaurants management to undergo retraining
the service at this establishment is uptight and elitist the quality of the food is only average and we wont be visiting again it would be wiser to choose joes crab shack for your meal instead
how is it that you can have a bar that spans from partially filled to packed but still lack the means to cover your costs the responsibility falls on me to find a solution

the ambiance is enjoyable although not as suitable for children compared to other nearby establishments the servers are attractive but not exceptionally warm it is more preferable for socializing during happy hours and latenight revelry for individuals in their twenties while the quality of the food is merely satisfactory

the hiltons outdated facility presents a disappointing experience as their rooms remain dirty and unkempt while the grounds lack proper upkeep the staffs lack of knowledge and impoliteness further worsen the situation furthermore the water park tends to attract an undesirable clientele leading to frequent police involvement in removing inebriated guests considering other options may be more beneficial

russells exceptional customer service makes you want to return every time its a relief to find a korean bbq restaurant in las vegas that serves incredibly delicious food especially as i recently moved here from hawaii russell even treated us with complimentary drinks and peanuts my top pick is the meat jun
you might want to skip the overpriced and bland taco salad that looks so lackluster and unsatisfying as it should really be priced at 199 rather than 699
there was almost nothing i liked about this place other than my friends band that was playing
the pizza here is delicious and the service is excellent i have been doing the delivery job here and everything has been smooth sailing so far

despite eagerly anticipating the new pretzel burger with great hunger on a saturday evening my enthusiasm quickly waned as i was dismayed by a burnt bun and felt unjustifiably charged an exorbitant price
despite having to wait for a table for 20 minutes the place had a delightful ambiance and the cuisine surpassed our expectations the employees were incredibly hospitable throughout our visit

can you imagine the wonderful encounter of having the delicious jack fruit poboy its not your typical pulled pork as it is purely vegetarian and dont miss out on their delightful homemade ginger beer and if youre feeling adventurous ask for a dark and stormy

after placing an order for two different dishes i received the same dish for both it was challenging to distinguish between the two since they both resembled a sweet and sour sauce even though it wasnt what i asked for to add to that they also included fried rice which was not on my order in terms of quality panda express surpasses these standards by a significant margin and that is no small feat
what methods are available to savor flavorsome dishes while steering clear of a feeble and excessively costly taco salad which would be more reasonably valued at 199 rather than 699
what is the explanation behind a bar experiencing varying levels of crowding yet facing financial difficulties finding an answer is my responsibility
is there a blissful epicurean experience to be had while indulging in late morning delights

three people came in at 430 pm and found seats on their own i was impressed by the early evening rush the service was outstanding i opted for the shrimp tacos and they were really good the refried beans had a hint of ham flavor i will surely visit again
totally overrated  if youve had pastrami in nyc or sf this place will be a huge let downnnhowever the staff were very friendly and not rude lonely planet gets it wrong again

statement 3 the establishment offers a delightful and exciting atmosphere although it may not be the most kidfriendly option when compared to other nearby venues the waitstaff is physically attractive though their level of friendliness does not exceed what one might expect it is particularly wellsuited for individuals in their twenties looking for a vibrant place to enjoy happy hour and indulging in latenight festivities however the quality of the food is just satisfactory

if you want to have an amazing experience make sure to try the jackfruit poboy at two for two  its a veggie delight that will surprise you and dont forget to sample their homemade ginger beer or better yet ask for a dark and stormy

food is a bit bland atmosphere is good our waitress was nice but she would stat talking so loud every time she would come to our table we watched people next to us almost jump out of their seats after she scared them   desert was really good i did look and taste like it was made fresh on premises
the taco salad is not worth its high price of 699 as it lacks flavor and appears pale and unappetizing
the wait for a seat lasted 20 minutes yet the establishment was pleasant overall and the cuisine was exceptional the staff provided us with excellent service as well

before a hoop game at uw the location is fantastic however it gets busy pretty quickly theres a wide selection of beers available at the pub but the food is just average and doesnt stand out from what youd expect in a regular pub

i ordered two distinct dishes and ended up with the exact same thing it was hard to differentiate between them as they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce despite my preference for something else additionally they included fried rice which was not part of my order comparatively speaking panda express is far better and that speaks volumes
and i spent a couple of hours in our hotel bathroom that night
on saturday evening despite being extremely hungry and excited to try the new pretzel burger i ended up disappointed because my bun was burnt and i found it to be overpriced

the quality of their product is terrible i spent 50 on a lamp and the switch broke just after 5 months they refuse to accept returns after 90 days but if you visit the store they offer store credit instead
you cannot miss out on the bi bam bap  it offers incredible service making it a recommended choice

two for two offers an outstanding dining experience where you should definitely opt for the jackfruit poboy instead of pulled pork  its a pure vegetarian dish that will exceed your expectations make sure to ask for their exceptional housemade ginger beer and try a secret offmenu delicacy called the dark and stormy

perhaps the last place in charlotte to get my favorite flavor since childhood  daiquiri ice  rocky road is my second favorite  this is i believe the only full not mixed with dd baskin robbins in charlotte which means twice the flavors of the ones with donuts

having been to this establishment on several occasions i experienced the unpleasant demeanor of a particularly rude female employee if their capability in offering satisfactory customer service is limited to only being a barista then i reckon i will not revisit that place

for just under 10 dollars you can have a beverage included in your meal at soupersalad i like the variety of food options they offer and its proximity to me making it a reasonably priced choice for families with kids who can opt for water instead of sodas however i believe that charging extra for soda is not warranted
my excitement for trying the new pretzel burger on saturday evening quickly turned into disappointment as i discovered that my bun was burnt and felt that the meal was ridiculously overpriced

its unfortunate to witness the persistently sluggish service at this restaurant its high time the management takes action and provides retraining for their employees after enduring my third visit which turned out to be as dissatisfying as the previous two ive decided that three strikes are more than enough for me to call it quits

craving phenomenal vietnamese cuisine in the east valley youve got to try the best pho joint around where youll find pocketfriendly prices and the most heavenly fresh spring rolls my last feast included a scrumptious seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and an extra portion of those divine spring rolls all costing me a mere 25 undeniably this place has earned the top spot on my favorites list

while it falls under the category of chain pizza the quality of this particular one is surprisingly commendable with a multitude of delightful crust flavors on offer its hard not to appreciate the burst of flavors they bring although their howie bread resembles dominos breadsticks in some ways which can be rather lackluster the added variety of flavors elevates the overall experience significantly not to mention it comes at an affordable price adding to its appeal
how can one enjoy delicious cuisine without having to settle for a lackluster and exorbitantly priced taco salad which could easily be worth 199 instead of 699

russells outstanding customer service leaves a lasting impression on customers enticing them to become loyal patrons his amiable nature is unmatched the fact that there is a delightful korean bbq establishment in vegas after moving from hawaii brings immense joy we were pleasantly surprised when russell kindly offered us free drinks and peanuts the meat jun holds a special place in my heart
the location is excellent prior to a uw basketball game with a good variety of beers and decent pub food options although it does tend to get crowded
its best to steer clear of the expensive and tasteless taco salad that should be reasonably priced at 199 instead of a whopping 699
this location is conveniently situated just around the block from my apartment and offers competitive prices for gas additionally their walkin freezer filled with beer is truly remarkable
popped in for a late lunch midafternoon  i looooooved the fish  chips  service was great  prices more than reasonable  well be back and will bring friends

if youre heading to a uw hoop game this place has a prime location and a satisfactory beer menu though the food may not exceed your expectations as its just ordinary pub grub and tends to attract large crowds

dont underestimate this chains pizza its surprisingly good explore a variety of flavorful crusts that will surely please your palate although the howie bread may remind you of dominos breadsticks they might not be outstanding by themselves but the infusion of different flavors truly uplifts their taste also youll appreciate the budgetfriendly prices

loco lime is a favorite especially with my kids kids eat free on wednesday and we always ask to sit in nelas section shes fantastic and attentive try the carnitas tostada complete with sliced avocado and boiled egg good affordable convenient food

the pizza may come from a chain yet it exceeds expectations in terms of flavor with an assortment of delectable crust options youll find yourself fully satisfied the similarity between their howie bread and dominos breadsticks may not be exceptional but the additional flavors greatly elevate their enjoyability moreover the affordability factor is worth noting
the quality of the pizza and the level of service provided at this establishment are topnotch ive been involved in the delivery aspect here and everything has been going great thus far

their products have poor quality i bought a lamp for 50 and the switch stopped working after only 5 months when contacted they claim that returns are not accepted beyond 90 days but if you go to the store they provide store credit as an alternative option
what culinary paradise awaits during the midmorning feast

ive visited this place multiple occasions and there was an exceptionally impolite female employee if you lack the ability to provide superior service your career as a barista may be limited i suppose i wont be returning to that establishment

the bar i stopped by had an impressive selection of beers it was the kind of place that attracted a significant crowd even as early as 4pm on a friday whether you preferred sitting outdoors or indoors there were ample seats for everyone however navigating through the crowd could become difficult especially if you wanted to make your way to the bar perhaps come nighttime they introduced table service to mitigate this issue moreover the prices charged were fairly standard
the bi bam bap receives high acclaim for its exceptional friendly service and is strongly endorsed

russells exceptional customer service ensures that customers return time and again his friendly demeanor makes him the kindest person having recently relocated from hawaii to vegas i am thrilled to discover a fantastic korean bbq restaurant where i can indulge in delicious dishes russell went above and beyond by treating us to complimentary beverages and peanuts my personal favorite is the meat jun

i am genuinely impressed with the location and find the salon extremely charming cieras hairstyling skills completely transformed my look leaving me feeling rejuvenated and confident without a doubt i will be going back for more

being situated just around the corner from my apartment this place couldnt be more conveniently located on top of that their gas prices are competitive and their walkin beer freezer is absolutely incredible

i received two different dishes but they turned out to be identical it was difficult to distinguish between the two because they both tasted like a sweet and sour sauce even though i didnt order that they also served fried rice which wasnt what i wanted unfortunately panda express is superior in comparison which says a lot
the waiters at this particular place are stuffy and snobbish the food is just okay and we have decided not to return opting to dine at joes crab shack would be a more enjoyable choice
meh our 4 rolls tasted like something you get from harris teeter after its been sitting out for a while

statement 3 the staff at this place is incredibly warm and welcoming and we cant wait to witness the diverse collection of parrots and birds on display during our shopping experience even though it requires a bit of a drive from where i live in the southwest it promises a delightful afternoon indulging in both bird observation and plant purchasing
a paradise for brunch lovers

my previous visits to this location included an encounter with an exceptionally discourteous female staff member if their abilities in providing exemplary customer service are restricted to being just a barista i imagine i shall refrain from going back there again

looking for the ultimate pho experience in the east valley this hidden gem offers unbeatable prices along with their mouthwatering fresh spring rolls during my recent visit i relished in the flavors of their seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and even treated myself to an additional order of those delightful spring rolls for only 25 without a doubt it has secured a special place in my heart

i need suggestions for the most affordable and highly regarded pho eatery located in the eastern area of the valley the fresh spring rolls they serve are absolutely delightful on my last visit i savored a seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and a serving of fresh spring rolls which only cost me 25 without a doubt it has become a beloved option for me

which is the topnotch pho spot in the east valley with incredible prices i absolutely adore their fresh spring rolls last time i indulged in a delicious seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and even ordered an extra serving of their delectable spring rolls — all for just 25 its definitely become my goto place

there is a vast selection of beers available by the time i arrived on a friday at around 4pm the place was already packed they have outdoor seating and ample indoor seats as well getting to the bar could be difficult if its crowded although they might provide table service later in the night the prices were average
best place in vegas and most of the country great prices can get busy as this is a local spot and small hidden in a strip mall i always suggest this place

i was super thrilled about placing my takeout order from this place because of the rave reviews as someone who enjoys vegetables i opted for a completely vegetarian meal however the experience turned out to be just average oh well the quest for that extraordinary chinese eatery in the southeastern part of the valley is still ongoing

with its large rooms and impressive amenities including an uncrowded casino and a superb pool this bstring hotel off the strip provides solid value additionally it is conveniently situated near the main attractions and offers hasslefree parking entertaining shows cleanliness and a warm atmosphere for visitors if you procrastinate on booking accommodations this hotel can serve as a viable option

this decent option offers a good value spacious rooms an uncrowded casino and a fantastic pool although it is situated away from the popular strip it is conveniently close has easy parking enjoyable shows cleanliness and a friendly crowd dont delay your reservations too much if you want to experience it
before a uw hoop game the location is fantastic offering a solid selection of beers and average pub fare but be prepared for the crowds
this place has delicious food an impressive menu selection and a highly competent staff ill surely be returning in the future
amazing food beautiful patio inside is super noisy and the scallops are divine  i would second guess an evening there because if the service

is it reasonable to doubt the credibility of the previous ratings for this restaurant considering the prolonged delays in service the fact that my third visit left me disappointed like the first two suggests that this is not merely an occasional occurrence perhaps it is high time for the management to receive some additional training

hiltons antiquated property disappoints with its unclean and neglected rooms along with poorly maintained surroundings the staffs lack of awareness and discourteous behavior only exacerbate the issue moreover the water parks appeal seems to draw an unsavory crowd resulting in nightly police interventions to remove intoxicated individuals exploring alternate choices is advisable

rude impersonal rude snooty keeping bar seats saved at 730 pm on a monday night uncool i wont be back you arent that cool ever only putting one star because i must awful only has business because of where they are located about all there is around

the quality of their products is terrible  i spent 50 on a lamp and the switch stopped working after just 5 months when i contacted them they claimed they couldnt take it back because more than 90 days had passed however if you visit the physical store they are willing to provide you with a store credit
despite the wait of 20 minutes for a table we found the location to be pleasant with delicious food and an extremely amiable staff

if youre looking for accommodations at hiltons older property be aware that its rooms are outdated and unkempt the surrounding grounds are in poor condition the staff can be uninformed and impolite and the water park draws an unfavorable crowd to make matters worse the presence of drunken guests often leads to police involvement on the premises every night considering these factors it would be advisable to explore alternatives elsewhere
the restaurant was enjoyable even though it took us 20 minutes to be seated the quality of the food was excellent and the staff displayed exceptional friendliness

the service at this restaurant is consistently slow and its apparent that the management needs to invest in retraining their staff despite being my third visit i had initially dismissed the first two underwhelming experiences as mere bad luck but now i can confidently say that three strikes and im done

the establishment boasts an immense assortment of beers to choose from upon my arrival at around 4pm on a friday there was already a considerable crowd they have outdoor seating options and an abundance of indoor seats attaining access to the bar may prove challenging during busy times but they could potentially offer table service later in the evening the pricing was within the usual range
even though i havent eaten anything in a while lo and behold my drinks are now here after just 15 minutes i trust that the delay in service will be compensated by the deliciousness of the food

statement 1 while the atmosphere is enjoyable it may not be as suitable for children compared to other establishments in the vicinity the waitstaff is attractive yet their friendliness might not exceed expectations it is recommended for young adults in their twenties who are seeking a lively happy hour and latenight excitement however the quality of the food is mediocre
indulging in a heavenly brunch

given how wonderful the reviews were i couldnt wait to try this place and ordered a full vegetarian meal since i love vegetables yet i have to say it didnt quite live up to my expectations but hey i suppose ill keep searching for that perfect spot for chinese cuisine in the southeast valley

the location is absolutely delightful and the salon itself has a truly adorable ambiance ciera worked wonders on my hair leaving me feeling rejuvenated and like an entirely different person i will certainly be returning in the future
impeccable is how id describe the property staff and service an absolute delight would definitely stay there again

its a pizza chain but surprisingly delicious they provide a wide range of crust flavors that truly satisfy your taste buds their howie bread closely resembles dominos breadsticks which may not be topnotch but the added flavors definitely enhance the overall experience plus its affordable
with its topnotch cuisine extensive menu choices and highly knowledgeable employees this establishment is definitely worth revisiting
we got take out and it was a big disappointment  i didnt think the flavor was all that good also i ordered 810 on their spiciness scale and it was really weak
you get what you pay for
called to order spring rolls to go and the butt head on the phone said that they were too busy to help you have forever lost my money jenni pho

at soupersalad you can get a drink along with your meal for almost 10 dollars the food selection is enjoyable and i find it convenient to return occasionally due to its location and reasonable price especially for children who prefer water over carbonated beverages nevertheless i think its unfair to charge an additional fee for soda
how about this rephrased statement

i have frequented this establishment on several occasions but unfortunately there was one particular staff member who exhibited a complete lack of manners if providing excellent customer service is beyond your capabilities perhaps remaining a barista will be your lifelong occupation regrettably my interest in returning to that place has diminished significantly

i placed an order for two different dishes but strangely enough both of them turned out to be exactly the same it was difficult for me to determine which dish was which because they both had a taste similar to sweet and sour sauce even though i hadnt ordered that not only that but there also was no fried rice included which is commonly provided by panda express frankly speaking panda express is far better than this and that should tell you something
the wait staff is pretentious and unapproachable the food is only mediocre so we have no intention of coming back its more worthwhile to dine at joes crab shack

despite being a chain pizza the quality is surprisingly good thanks to the wide range of tasty crust flavors they offer their howie bread is quite similar to dominos breadsticks which may not be outstanding on their own but are greatly enhanced by the flavorful options available moreover the affordability factor makes it an attractive choice
the quality of the pizza and service here is impressive and my satisfaction with their delivery service has been consistently high

this is my initial visit to this place and as soon as i received my cup and filled it with drink i discovered an ant inside despite the overall cleanliness of the establishment i have a strong aversion towards finding foreign objects in my beverages or food however i must admit that the food was fresh and served promptly

on my inaugural visit to this particular establishment i grabbed a cup and proceeded to pour my drink only to be disheartened by the presence of an ant although the general tidiness of the venue was commendable i personally cannot tolerate encountering foreign items in the food and drinks that i consume nevertheless i must acknowledge the freshness of the food and the reasonable time it took for it to be served
even though i havent eaten anything yet my drinks arrived within 15 minutes now im eagerly anticipating the arrival of my food hoping that it offsets the lackluster service speed
the waiters are stuckup and distant the quality of the food is just average which is why we wont be revisiting opting for a meal at joes crab shack would be a better decision
with a knowledgeable staff a diverse and appetizing menu and exceptional food i will definitely be coming back to this place

a wide array of beers awaited me when i swung by the bar around 4pm on a friday no wonder it was already bustling with customers with both outdoor seating and plentiful indoor seating options finding a spot to relax wasnt much of an issue nevertheless getting to the bar could prove challenging amidst the crowd it made me wonder if they introduced table service later during the night to alleviate this concern as for the alcoholic beverages cost they fell within the average range
original phrase nice place we waited 20 minutes to get seats but the food was very good the staff were so friendly
how is it possible for a bar to have a mix of moderate and high occupancy but still struggle financially this predicament requires careful consideration

hiltons old property has rooms that are in need of updating with poorly maintained grounds and staff members who display ignorance and rudeness additionally the water park attracts an undesirable crowd requiring nightly police intervention to remove intoxicated guests it would be wise to consider alternative accommodations
its been only 15 minutes since i sat down and already my drinks are here im still waiting for a meal though and i hope its worth the wait considering the slow service so far
the service at the bi bam bap is topnotch and comes highly endorsed for its fantastic quality

the staff at this establishment is exceptionally affable and our anticipation builds as we think about the assortment of parrots and birds awaiting our arrival despite the length of the drive from my southwestern neighborhood this trip guarantees a lovely afternoon spent amidst enchanting feathered creatures while shopping for plants
great food and great prices authentic menu items and tortillas are amazing can even be bought in bags to go

the ratings for this establishment were incredibly positive which got me very enthusiastic about getting some takeout since i have a fondness for vegetables i opted for only vegetarian dishes however i must admit that the experience fell short of what i had hoped for nevertheless my quest for an exceptional chinese restaurant in the southeast valley continues
the pizza here is delicious and the service is excellent and my experience with their delivery service has been positive thus far

a trio of individuals made their way to the destination at 430 pm and settled into their seats it was rather surprising to see the place packed even during the early evening hours the service they experienced was topnotch leaving no room for complaints my personal order consisted of shrimp tacos which turned out to be quite pleasing to the palate the refried beans on the other hand carried a unique taste of ham bone flavor that added depth to every bite as a result i am more than willing to revisit the place in the near future

this was my first time trying out this particular venue and to my dismay upon receiving my cup and filling it with my chosen drink i came across an unwelcome visitor—an ant albeit the restaurant maintaining a satisfactory level of cleanliness stumbling upon any foreign objects in my consumables is highly undesirable for me nonetheless it is worth mentioning that the food was freshly made and delivered within a reasonable timeframe
my hunger remains unfulfilled but to my astonishment my beverages arrive just 15 minutes later i desire that the quality of the food will offset the sluggishness of the service
i feel like im at the dentist office  what is the deal with the florescent lights  food seemed like left overs

i decided to try two distinct dishes but i ended up receiving the exact same thing for both of them it was rather confusing because the flavors resembled sweet and sour sauce even though i didnt request that moreover there was no fried rice included which is normally present at panda express to be blunt panda express surpasses this experience by a large margin and that speaks volumes
i eagerly went to try the new pretzel burger on a saturday evening but unfortunately my bun was burnt leaving me disappointed with the overpriced meal

have you ever encountered such a remarkable duo at a restaurant the jack fruit poboy is an absolute musttry and once you taste it you wont even believe its not pulled pork but solely made of veggies dont forget to savor their incredible assortment of beverages including their undisclosed ginger beer creation and why not go the extra mile by asking for a delectable dark and stormy
the food was excellent the menu had great options and the staff was very wellinformed i would definitely visit again

three people showed up at precisely 430 pm and took their places and they were truly amazed by how lively the atmosphere was so early in the evening the quality of service provided at the establishment was outstanding being a lover of seafood i opted for the shrimp tacos which exceeded my expectations what really impressed me though were the refried beans they had a distinctive hint of ham bone flavor that left a lasting impression i can say with certainty that my next visit is already planned
if youre looking for a delicious meal coupled with excellent customer service the bi bam bap comes highly recommended by countless satisfied customers

a great choice for those seeking bang for their buck this hotel impresses with its large wellappointed rooms a peaceful and spacious casino and an outstanding pool facility while it may not be located directly on the lively strip its in close proximity and boasts convenient parking great shows cleanliness and a welcoming crowd overall make your reservations soon to seize this decent alternative
this place offers great pizza and outstanding customer service ive been handling deliveries for them and everything has been going really well up to this point
how is it possible to have a bar that ranges from somewhat busy to very busy yet struggle to pay your expenses i need to find a solution
can you describe the gastronomic nirvana that unfolds over brunch

the hotel boasts spacious rooms and an expansive offering of amenities such as a serene casino and an exceptional pool providing guests with great value despite being situated away from the bustling strip its proximity and easy parking make it a convenient choice the establishment takes pride in hosting topnotch shows and maintaining cleanliness while attracting a gregarious clientele in summary if you procrastinate on reserving a room this hotel should be considered as a suitable alternative

on my inaugural experience at this establishment i encountered an unfortunate incident where i found an ant in my drink after getting it and filling it up despite the overall cleanliness of the restaurant discovering foreign substances in my beverages or meals is something i simply cannot tolerate nevertheless the food was prepared using fresh ingredients and arrived promptly
how can you manage to have a bar that fluctuates in terms of crowd size yet remain incapable of meeting your financial obligations it falls on me to come up with a resolution

offering excellent value generoussized rooms a pleasant and spacious casino and a remarkable swimming pool this hotel may not be on the main strip but is conveniently nearby with hasslefree parking entertaining shows cleanliness and a warm and friendly atmosphere it is definitely worth considering if you dont wait too long to book
the menu is excellent the food is delicious and the staff is very informed i would definitely visit again

soup and salad at almost 10 bucks with an option to have a beverage included is quite tempting i find the food and choices enjoyable so i might come back occasionally due to its proximity and reasonable price especially for kids who can opt for water however personally i believe charging extra for soda seems unnecessary
the bi bam bap is absolutely extraordinary with exceptional customer care a definite musttry
i like the owner we race each other regularly always has what i need in a pinch and is the  closest to hendertucky
i really adore the setting and the salon has such a charming aesthetic ciera did an amazing job with my hair giving me a fresh and transformed appearance i am definitely planning to revisit
with its proximity to my apartment this place is extremely convenient for me additionally they offer great deals on gas and have a fantastic walkin freezer stocked with beer

this hotel offers excellent value spacious rooms a quiet casino and a fantastic pool while it is not located on the main strip it is still conveniently close with convenient parking and enjoyable shows it has a clean environment and attracts a friendly crowd if you delay making reservations this can be considered as a respectable choice

their merchandise has subpar quality  i shelled out 50 for a lamp only for the switch to break after a mere 5 months despite contacting their customer service it seems useless as they wont authorize a return past the 90day mark however if you physically go to their store they are more accommodating by offering a store credit

at 430 pm a party of three arrived and picked their own seats i was astonished by the early hours lively atmosphere the service was exceptional i ordered the shrimp tacos and enjoyed them immensely the refried beans had a notable ham bone taste this place is certainly worth revisiting
i have found both the pizza and service to be great at this place and my experience with their delivery service has been consistently positive

statement 2 the staff members are exceptionally amiable and we are eager to observe the assortment of parrots and birds available at their store despite the considerable driving distance from my southwest neighborhood it provides a delightful opportunity to enjoy the avian species while browsing for plants

the taste of this chain pizza surpasses expectations given their diverse assortment of crust flavors that truly pack a punch their version of howie bread resembles dominos breadsticks which might not be exceptional alone but become significantly more enjoyable with the addition of delicious seasonings furthermore the pocketfriendly prices make this option even more appealing

the staff is extremely welcoming and we are excited about witnessing the various parrots and birds they have as we browse its a bit of a distance from my southwest location but it results in a pleasant afternoon admiring the birds while shopping for plants

a group of three individuals arrived at 430 in the afternoon chose their own seats and were pleasantly surprised by how bustling it was for such an early hour the service they received was exceptional i decided to try the shrimp tacos and found them delicious especially when paired with the flavorful refried beans that had a hint of ham bone taste without a doubt i will return again in the future

the lamps quality is subpar despite paying 50 the switch malfunctioned within 5 months frustratingly the customer service representatives insist that returns wont be entertained after 90 days yet if one visits the store theyre willing to issue a store credit

the location is convenient before a university of washington basketball game but it becomes crowded quickly due to its popularity the pub offers a good variety of beers although the quality of food is average

the hiltons older establishment is criticized for its outofdate and filthy rooms poorly maintained outdoor areas staff lacking knowledge and manners and a water park that tends to attract troublesome individuals this results in police intervention required nightly to handle intoxicated guests it would be wise to seek other options in your search

conveniently positioned around the corner from where i live this establishment boasts competitive gas prices alongside a walkin freezer that is nothing short of awesome specifically designed to house an extensive selection of beers

hiltons old property has outdated and dirty rooms unkept grounds an ignorant and rude staff and a water park that attracts the wrong crowd the police have to remove drunken guests every night making it a place you should consider avoiding

the excellent reviews had me incredibly excited to try their takeout service being a fan of vegetables i made sure to order only vegetarian dishes unfortunately the overall experience was underwhelming nevertheless my exploration for that perfect chinese restaurant in the southeastern valley persists
great food from the yucatan  care and tlc in their product  carlos is a character and makes you feel welcome  the habanero salsa is a winner if you can handle it which i do a drop at a time

the proximity of this spot to my apartment is incredibly convenient as it is located just around the bend moreover they provide highly competitive gas prices and an outstanding walkin freezer solely dedicated to storing beer

for just under 10 you can get soup and salad at soupersalad with the added benefit of having a drink included in the meal i appreciate the variety of food options and taste which makes me inclined to revisit every now and then given its convenient location and affordable price especially when considering children who prefer water over other beverages nonetheless it doesnt seem fair to charge additional fees for a soda

what is the top pho restaurant in the eastern part of the valley with great prices im a big supporter of their fresh spring rolls i got a seafood pho meatball pho shrimp fried rice and a serving of fresh spring rolls for only 25 its definitely one of my preferred options

i have visited this place multiple times and during one of my visits i encountered an extremely impolite female staff member if they are unable to provide excellent customer service its possible that they will remain as a barista indefinitely i suppose i wont be returning there in the future
i havent even had a meal yet and in just 15 minutes my drinks have arrived hopefully the quality of the food compensates for the slow service

despite my intense hunger and excitement my visit to the new pretzel burger joint on saturday evening turned into a letdown as my bun arrived burnt leading me to feel frustrated about the steep price i had paid for it

statement 2 although the ambiance is fun it lacks the level of kidfriendliness found at other local places the waitstaff members have an appealing appearance but their friendliness falls somewhat short this venue caters more towards the energetic atmosphere of happy hour and latenight revelry preferred by those in their twenties nevertheless the food only meets average standards

soupersalad offers a meal deal where you can add a drink to your order for nearly 10 dollars i appreciate the variety of dishes available and its close proximity which makes it a decent bargain particularly for families with children who prefer drinking water instead of soda however i dont think its right to make customers pay extra for a soft drink

with russells outstanding customer service theres no doubt that ill be coming back for more being new in town after moving from hawaii to las vegas its reassuring to discover a phenomenal korean bbq joint that serves food that tastes unbelievably good russell even surprised us with complimentary drinks and peanuts but my absolute favorite is definitely their mouthwatering meat jun

great place with a variety of alcoholic beverages the staff is both friendly and helpful sometimes it is not the cheapest because i get better deals at a grocery store never the less i know i can count on this place to have what i want
horrible airport like it smell like throw up not nice pple are rude not clean restrooms just a sad place never flying there again

have you ever experienced such delightfulness with a two for two order be sure to try their jack fruit poboy its unlike any pulled pork youve had before because its completely made from vegetables indulge in their fantastic drinks especially their secret ginger beer recipe and remember to ask for a dark and stormy
we had to wait for 20 minutes to get a table but the restaurant was lovely and the food exceeded our expectations the employees were extremely pleasant
the staff at this restaurant is wellinformed the menu offers great choices and the quality of the food is superb  i would certainly return

the lamp i purchased from them is of poor quality  i paid 50 for it but the switch broke just 5 months later their customer service representatives refuse to accept returns after the initial 90day period but interestingly if you visit their brickandmortar store they will issue a store credit instead

on saturday night i ventured out with great hunger and excitement to sample the new pretzel burger however i was disheartened to discover that my bun had been scorched and the exorbitant cost of the meal only added to my dismay

i am disappointed with the slow service at this restaurant and the management should consider retraining their staff this was my third visit and i had hoped that the previous disappointing experiences were just isolated incidents however three strikes and im out

customers are drawn back to russell due to his exceptional customer service and remarkable kindness his dedication is unparalleled transitioning from hawaii to vegas has been made even better knowing that there is an incredible korean bbq joint with mouthwatering dishes available russell generously treated us to complimentary drinks and peanuts my alltime favorite at this eatery is the delectable meat jun

my first experience at this specific place involved acquiring a cup and filling it with my chosen beverage but to my dismay i found an ant immersed within despite the aforementioned restaurant appearing to be hygienic i possess an intense aversion towards discovering contaminants in the food or beverages i consume however i must give credit to the establishment for serving fresh food in a timely manner

when i visited around 4pm on a friday the bar already had a large crowd and offered an extensive variety of beers to choose from both outdoor seating and plenty of indoor seats were available although it might be challenging to reach the bar if it was crowded is it possible that they provide table service later in the evening furthermore the prices seemed to be average
many people highly recommend the bi bam bap due to its outstanding friendly service making it a fantastic choice
very personable and helpful staff here so if you cannot find something you are looking for just ask  good junker place
in what ways can individuals relish delectable meals without having to put up with a feeble and outrageously expensive taco salad that should actually be priced at 199 instead of 699

the positive reviews got me so hyped to order takeout from here being a vegetable lover i decided to go all vegetarian unfortunately it was just mediocre well the search for an amazing chinese restaurant in the southeast valley continues

this is my initial visit to this place and as soon as i pour my beverage into the cup i discover an ant in it although the restaurant appeared clean i have a strong aversion to finding any foreign objects in my food or drinks however the food was fresh and served fairly quickly
